casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Alberto RIOS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017

Mary A. Beattie, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Mitchell S. Brody, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 1, 156 A.3d 18 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
